plot outline: Santo And Pappu Are From Small Villages. Santo Dreams Of Becoming A Super Star While Pappu Dreams Of Owning A Mercedes Showroom. They Go To Kolkata And Work As Dance Teacher & Karate Teacher For Munmun In Disguise. Munmun Promises To Fulfill Their Dreams When They Confess Their Truth. She Is Kidnapped By Fakir But Joy Saves Her. All Problems Are Resolved. Santu & Pappu'S Dreams Also Come True.
title: Bawali Unlimited
